page.title: 06ST.ANDREW'S CHURCH
page.content: {St. Andrew's Church}is situated in the {West End of Clevedon}by the harbour.It is over 800 years old. There are three main services at 8am, 9am and 6.30pm.The vicar is called { {Canon Wheatly-Price }and he and { {Rev.Turner}conduct all the weddingd,funerals and christenings. On average there are 15 weddings a year. There are over 2000 graves in the graveyard. The church is mentioned in {Samuel {Taylor Coleridge's poem "In Memoriam". The church has a centre where groups such as the mothers union and pathfinders meet. There are 32 different groups run by the church and to accommodate these a new church centre is soon to be built
